original: An artificery tool that channels transmutation magic to repair objects. It’s possible to reverse its magic and cause it to weaken objects instead of repairing them. \n \nIt’s quite large and requires two people to properly carry and use it.
translation: 一种用奥术能源施展形变术类魔法，修复物品的工具。也可以逆向施法，用来破坏而非修复物品。\n\n尺寸很大，需要至少两个人搬运使用。
